original_text: “From the time that the daily sacrifice is abolished and the abomination that causes desolation is set up, there will be 1,290 days.
korean_text: 매일 드리는 제사를 폐하며 멸망하게 할 가증한 것을 세울 때부터 천이백구십 일을 지낼 것이요

sentences.original_text: From the time that the daily sacrifice is abolished
and the abomination that causes desolation is set up
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 황폐하게 하는 가증한 것이 세워질 때
